eqnarray:
\begin{eqnarray}
~[ Q_{ja}, P_{\mu} ] = 0, \quad
U_{A}^{-1} Q_{ja} U_{A} = {A_{a}}^{b} Q_{jb}, \quad \forall A \in SL(2,\mathbb{C})
\nonumber \\
V_{U}^{-1} Q_{ja} V_{U} = \rho(U)_{jk} Q_{ka}, \quad \forall U \in G
\

\begin{eqnarray}
i [ Q_{ja}, b ] = p_{j}(\partial) f
\qquad
\{ Q_{ja}, f \} = q_{j}(\partial) b
\nonumber \\
i [ Z_{jk}, b ] = p_{jk}(\partial) b
\qquad
i [ Z_{jk}, f ] = q_{jk}(\partial) f.
\label{tensor}
\

\begin{eqnarray}
~[ \{ Q_{ja} , Q_{kb} \} - \epsilon_{ab} Z_{jk}, b ] = 0, \quad
[ \{ Q_{a} , \bar{Q}_{\bar{b}} \} - 2 \sigma^{\mu}_{a\bar{b}} P_{\mu} , b ] = 0
\nonumber \\
~[ \{ Q_{a} , Q_{b} \} - \epsilon_{ab} Z_{jk}, f ] = 0, \quad
[ \{ Q_{a} , \bar{Q}_{\bar{b}} \} - 2 \sigma^{\mu}_{a\bar{b}} P_{\mu} , f]  = 0;
\

\begin{eqnarray}
~[ b(x), b(y) ] = - i p(\partial) D(x-y) \qquad
\{ f(x), f(y) \} = - i q(\partial) D(x-y)
\

\begin{eqnarray}
z = A + i B, \quad \chi_{1a} = p_{a}, \quad \chi_{2a} = p_{a}, 
\quad F^{\mu\nu} = V^{\mu\nu} \quad
Q_{1a} = Q_{\uparrow a}, \quad Q_{2a} = Q_{\downarrow a}.
\nonumber
\

\begin{eqnarray}
|\Psi|^{2} = - 2\pi \int d\alpha^{+}_{m}(p) 
\overline{\tilde{f}}^{\mu}(p) \tilde{f}_{\mu}(p)
\nonumber \\
+ {\pi\over 2} [ Re(\alpha) - 2 m^{2} ] \int d\alpha^{+}_{m}(p) 
\overline{\tilde{f}}^{\mu\nu}(p) \tilde{f}_{\mu\nu}(p)
- {\pi\over 4} Im(\alpha)  \int d\alpha^{+}_{m}(p) \epsilon^{\mu\nu\rho\sigma}
\overline{\tilde{f}}_{\mu\nu}(p) \tilde{f}_{\rho\sigma}(p).
\

\begin{eqnarray}
\left\{ \psi_{a}(x), \psi_{b}(y) \right\} 
= i~m~\vec{c}^{2}~\epsilon_{ab}~D_{m}(x-y),
\nonumber \\
\left\{ \psi_{a}(x), \bar{\psi}_{\bar{b}}(y) \right\} =
\vec{c}\cdot\vec{c}^{*} \sigma^{\mu}_{a\bar{b}}~\partial_{\mu}D_{m}(x-y)
\nonumber \\
\left\{ \chi_{a}(x), \chi_{b}(y) \right\} 
= i~m~\vec{d}^{2}~\epsilon_{ab}~D_{m}(x-y),
\nonumber \\
\left\{ \chi_{a}(x), \bar{\chi}_{\bar{b}}(y) \right\} =
\vec{d}\cdot\vec{d}^{*} \sigma^{\mu}_{a\bar{b}}~\partial_{\mu}D_{m}(x-y)
\nonumber \\
\left\{ \psi_{a}(x), \chi_{b}(y) \right\} 
= i~m~\vec{c}\cdot\vec{d}~\epsilon_{ab}~D_{m}(x-y),
\nonumber \\
\left\{ \psi_{a}(x), \bar{\chi}_{\bar{b}}(y) \right\} =
\vec{c}\cdot\vec{d}^{*} \sigma^{\mu}_{a\bar{b}}~\partial_{\mu}D_{m}(x-y).
\

~[ Q_{ja}, P_{\mu} ] = 0, \quad

\nonumber \\
